channel.title: I think its time for moparscape 4.0 0.o
channel.description: Runescape HD was released, there is like 400 new items that needs to be added, along with runescape fullscreen, and diffrent attack patterns, i think its time, for the new moparscape 4.0

item.title: I think its time for moparscape 4.0 0.o
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

wuzupmyhom:

btw, im 17, so get ur facts strait, and i ahve no idea how to code, but maybey someone can leach a 503 server and client, and send it to him so he can replace it

So your 13 maybe, because I would expect a 17yr old to be able to spell.

item.title: I think its time for moparscape 4.0 0.o
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

If the creator is anything like me, he has tons of projects going on, and can not balance time between work, school, and programming hobbies. Or he just does not want to do it, and wants the community to stay alive so he keeps the website up. I have no idea but, I bet I am close to home.

Read full topic

item.title: I think its time for moparscape 4.0 0.o
item.dc:creator: @wuzupmyhom wuzupmyhom
item.description:
@wuzupmyhom wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:10, topic:225244”]Hey sorry Moparisthebest has a life, you guys are maybe what like 11? He’s in collage and has a fat girlfriend, you guys haven’t hit puberty yet![that means you nohope]

How about you make the moparscape 4.0, send it to mopar and he can replace it.[/quote]

btw, im 17, so get ur facts strait, and i ahve no idea how to code, but maybey someone can leach a 503 server and client, and send it to him so he can replace it

im 15 =)! i already hit puberty! and this forum has turned into a bunch of leechers…thats why their goin omg someone make a better client…plzz
and to the "“11” year olds casey was talking about add the models open up your class8.java, c & p…add a new id and change it to your new model…wow kids look how easy that was

item.title: I think its time for moparscape 4.0 0.o
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“wuzupmyhom, post:8, topic:225244”]well is moparisthebest still into making clients? well mopars client used to be the thing, then new items came out, and there was never any updates to mopar, so people started making clients such as silabsofts client, frugooscapes new 503 client exactly like todays rs, witch i think someone should work on with moparisthebest…but this is just me[/quote]You actually skipped a year in that story ^^. People just forgot the fun times or most of the people from that time are gone.

Read full topic

item.title: I think its time for moparscape 4.0 0.o
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“PeeHPee, post:5, topic:225244”][quote author=Tagged Santa link=topic=296069.msg2380922#msg2380922 date=1218562204]

Moparisthebest just doesn’t care about private servers.
Get over it.

I’m sure I made a petition on this, also there was 4 other threads about this kind of thing yesterday, too bad they got locked.

I wasn’t complaining about the Mod’s at present, I just think it’d be good if their was more…
Plus seeing as though MITB just, sit’s there doing nothing, doesn’t help much…
[/quote]

How the fuck is that in anyway related with this thread?[/quote]Moparisthebest made Moparscape 3?

Read full topic
